fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: If there were no Western monitors, or no international monitors, this variable is coded as missing.
fxInfo_question: Were there allegations of significant vote-fraud by any Western monitors?
fxInfo_sources: NELDA 47 (Hyde and Marinov 2012); IDEA; websites by Western election monitors.
name: v2elwestmon
